diamond.scene

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • diamond.scene.Camera
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Scene

    public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    Die Klasse Kamera steuert die View-Objekte
    Version:
    0.1 pre-alpha, 2013-02-21
    Author:
    Uwe Wilko Gruenefeld
